entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
